episodes.title: Children of God Part 1: What a Piece of Shit
episodes.description: David Berg. A name I wish I never have to hear again, and yet unfortunately I have to study this pos for another 2 weeks. oh lord help me, take me away! Children of God is a cult that took off, and never stopped going. Still active today with most of its members in hiding....probably because of the terrible stuff that was done. In this part 1 of 3 episode we talk about the upbringing of the leader, and the humble beginnings of the Children of God. Thanks to our monthly supporters HotMessJess Jesse Householder Ed hood Teresa StCyr Johanna McQuiston ★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★
